div.class: fktJzd AKpWA vS6Uxe DdtOdf fOU46b yMcSQd Ly6Unf G9Qloe KuNac

div.p: Week 6 lessons will be posted after 8am, Monday April 27th

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: We have moved all of the yearbook sales online. Yearbooks will be available to purchase online through the end of May.
Use the link below with the School Code of 2683.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: Per Governor Abbott all Texas schools will remain closed and will not return to campus instruction for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School year. Beckville ISD will continue Home Learning for the remainder of the school year.
More details from Beckville ISD for our students and parents will be provided and posted on the school website as they become available.

p.a: Video from BSE to our Students
Video from JH to our Students

div.p: All assignments and information for the week of April 27th-May 1st will be posted on the Home Learning section of the website after 8am Monday, April 27th.

All assignments and information for the week of April 20th-24th is posted on the Home Learning section of the website. All teachers are available by email from 8am-4pm. Please reach out to them if you need to make other time arrangements.
If you have not returned your athletic equipment, please email Coach Ross or Coach Downs to make arrangements.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

div.p: If your child has a medication in the school nurse's office, it must be picked up prior to May 21, 2020. The school can not keep medications from year to year.

Nurses will be at the elementary and Jr High nurse offices at the hours listed below. If unable to pick up at these times, please make arrangements with the school nurse prior to the last week of school to pick up any unused medications. Any unused medication will be discarded after May 21, 2020.

span.span: Empowering Teens: NIDA Toolkit for Out of School Time

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

div.p: Many teachers have sent information to me about different issues this week and we have solved many of those by relaying the information to the teacher. This takes a little extra time and we cannot help you as quickly as we would like. Feel free to contact us directly for any issues so we can help you as soon as we can. If you send an email to ithelpdesk@beckvilleisd.net it will immediately be entered into our ticketing system. Please add a phone number to your email, so that we can call you back if we need to. We are here to help in any way that we can.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: I know that with limited internet access in our district, parents are looking for ways to connect.
You can access the school internet from any of the parking lots next to our buildings. A school device will automatically connect to the correct network.
We have added additional Wifi in the stadium parking lot. You should be able to have high-speed access from any parking space in the stadium parking lot.

Many thanks to the businesses in Carthage that are also giving student's access to their Wifi passwords. The ones that I have posted are the ones that I know of at the moment. I will update the list as I learn of more.
Sally Brown Library - info on window
Pippen Motor Company- info on window
